title: Ticket #5825: Make sure condor_status and condor_q man pages are up-to-date
description: Make sure that all fields in condor_status and condor_q are explained in the man pages.
remarks:
2016-Sep-15 16:50:25 by wenger:
Also see #5892 -- today's commit for that actually is mostly general improvements to the condor_q man page.

There are a bunch of TEMP comments in the LaTeX source about things that I still didn't address in the condor_q man page...
check_ins:
2016-Sep-20 15:29   Check-in [49250]: Gittrac #5825: Removed -globus from the condor_q man page and replaced it with -grid; various related updates. (By Kent Wenger )
2016-Sep-15 16:43   Check-in [49208]: Gittrac #5892: Added notes about when -batch became the default for condor_q. Also did a lot of fixing up of the man page -- tons of stuff was outdated because of batch mode, and there were lots of other problems. (Also see #5825.) (Note that fixes are not complete -- see TEMP comments.) (By Kent Wenger )
creator: wenger
